item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
I'm seeing Yahoo is hiring a lot of interns, but not many permanent position, it could last for sometime.
I'm trying some other sources now - a friend told me PG&E is hiring a lot, will try to direct the resume there, but it may not be realistic as PG&E is at San Ramon.
item.content:encoded:
I’m seeing Yahoo is hiring a lot of interns, but not many permanent position, it could last for sometime.

I’m trying some other sources now – a friend told me PG&E is hiring a lot, will try to direct the resume there, but it may not be realistic as PG&E is at San Ramon.
